sentences.en: Experts are dismissing claims that the painting is a forgery.
sentences.cn: 专家排除了这幅画是赝品的说法。

sentences.en: He was found guilty of forgery.
He was sent to prison for forgery.
sentences.cn: 他因伪造罪而被关进监狱.

sentences.en: He was sentenced to 3 years for forgery.
sentences.cn: 他因假造文件被判了三年徒刑.

sentences.en: I own the document to be a forgery.
sentences.cn: 我承认这文件是伪造的.

sentences.en: It is forgery even if the document is incomplete or ineffective in law.
sentences.cn: 即使此伪造的文件在法律上是不完整的或失效的,其行为也构成了伪造罪.

sentences.en: The expert pronounced the picture to be a forgery.
sentences.cn: 专家断言这张图是赝品.

sentences.en: The painting was a very clever forgery.
sentences.cn: 这幅画是件很巧妙的赝品。

sentences.en: The secretary was falsely convicted of forgery.
sentences.cn: 秘书被判伪造罪很冤枉.

sentences.en: They knew the painting was a forgery. Moreover, they knew who had painted it.
sentences.cn: 他们知道那幅画是赝品. 而且还知道是谁仿画的.

sentences.en: This picture is not really by Picasso. It is a forgery.
sentences.cn: 这张画并非毕加索画的, 是伪造品.

sentences.en: You may take it in your hand; it's no forgery. "
sentences.cn: 你可以拿过去看, 这可不是伪造的. ”

words.tran_cn: 伪造（forge的过去式）；锻造（金属）

trans.tran_cn: 伪造，伪造罪，伪造物，伪造签字
trans.tran_en: a document, painting, or piece of paper money that has been copied illegally
